jsx.http.rpc
Class XMLHttpContext

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
          jsx.http.rpc.HttpRemote.Context
              jsx.http.rpc.XMLHttpContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
XMLHttpClient, XMLHttpServer
public abstract class XMLHttpContext
extends HttpRemote.Context

An abstract base class for an XML based serialization through HTTP context.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org
